# appstore Provider

Interact with App Store Connect.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configuration for the App Store Connect provider
provider "appstore" {
  key_id      = "2X9R4HXF34"
  issuer_id   = "57246542-96fe-1a63-e053-0824d011072a"
  private_key = file("key.p8")
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `issuer_id` (String) Issuer ID from the API Keys page in App Store Connect, for example, 57246542-96fe-1a63-e053-0824d011072a.
- `key_id` (String) Private key ID from App Store Connect, for example, 2X9R4HXF34.
- `private_key` (String, Sensitive) PEM-encoded private key from App Store Connect. Keep your API keys secure and private. Donâ€™t share your keys, store keys in a code repository, or include keys in client-side code. If the key becomes lost or compromised, remember to revoke it immediately.
